attributes.action: Democrat removed from Liberal Democrat because Tim Farron won't except Democracy
attributes.additional_details: Continuing refusing to except political process of this country whilst doing radio TV interviews
attributes.background: Tim Farron refuses to except democracy and him being the leader of liberal democrats can not continue using Democrats in his party's name

rejection.details:
The name of a political party is a matter for the party concerned, not for the Government or Parliament.

The registration of party names for electoral purposes is a matter for the Electoral Commission, which is an independent regulatory body. Please refer to the following website for information on the work of the Commission:
http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk
